entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
